dynamideForm.htmlsrc: <html> <head> <script> function openNewProject(projectURL){ window.frames['idetop'].openProject(projectURL); window.frames['idetop'].openPage(); //%% this is a kludge to open the default first page in the project } </script> <title>Dynamide</title> </head> <frameset rows="100%,*" framespacing="0"> <frame src="/dynamide/ide?next=idetop&SESSIONID=$SESSIONID" NAME="idetop" /> <frame src="/dynamide/ide?next=idehidden&SESSIONID=$SESSIONID" NAME="idehidden" /> </frameset> </html>
